title: Huntsman - The Orphanage [WineGame]
description:

Developer: ShadowShifters

Find the twelve orphanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s mementos and place them on the correct headstones to set the lost souls free.
Did we mention the headstones are in a hedge maze? Custom-created by a Ã¢â‚¬ËœRipleyÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Believe-It-Or-NotÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ Maze Master?

________________________________________________________________



MAKE SURE YOU INSTALLED 'WINESKIN WINERY' ON YOUR SYSTEM

Questions & Answers
_________________

Q: Why is my screen-brightness adjusted as soon as I launch the game?
A: Because the 'wrapper's' gamma is adjusted so you can actually see something in-game.

Q: The game is too light or too dark on my system, what can I do?
A: Holt the alt/option key on your mac keyboard when double-clicking the game > Go to: 'Set Screen Options' > Adjust the gamme correction by using the slider.

Q: There's only only resolution available when I launch the game, how can I play at a different resolution?
A: Holt the alt/option key on your mac keyboard when double-clicking the game > Go to: 'Set Screen Options' > Change 'Current Resolution' to the resolution you want.

Q: My normal mouse pointer shows up on top of the game window, how can I fix this?
A: You can't really fix it. You can, however, switch to a different window and then switch back to the game. 
You'll see that your mouse pointer isn't showing anymore, but it's just for the time being, since it's somehow a simulator thats running and not an actually full screen thingy.

Q: Whatsup with the checkbox named 'Windowed' when I start the game and why it's (un)checked?
A: Don't be scared, click (/check) it and see what happens. Personally, I find it more attractive to leave it unchecked, but it's up to you.


ENJOY THE GAME!
